name: core_simd::masks::Mask::<T, N>::to_int

core_simd::masks::Mask: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 25197, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 31096, name: "core_simd::masks::mask_impl::Mask" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 95, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 0, name: "T" }) }), Const(TyConst { kind: Param(ParamConst { index: 1, name: "N" }), id: TyConstId(37, ThreadLocalIndex) })]))) })])

doc:
Converts the mask to a vector of integers, where 0 represents `false` and -1
 represents `true`.
